title: "Tensoic Releases Playground for Kannada Llama on NVIDIA A100s"
excerpt: "Tensoic, in partnership with E2E Networks, which is one the biggest providers of cloud GPUs in India, have released the playground which is hooked to NVIDIA A100 GPUs. The creators said that the Xylem.AI platform is used for inference, which is superfast and with mind blowing inference stack."
